segments.text: Don't just stand outside . Come on in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Alex . Remember ? This is Sean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Over there are Stacy and Rebecca . We're all on the school's tennis team .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who's that guy who's handing out beer to everyone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my boyfriend Matt . Isn't he cute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . I'll introduce you two .
segments.speaker: S1
